Title: Cracks in Temghar dam, Pune’s drinking water lifeline
Content: Acknowledging that the construction of the Temghar dam, one of Pune’s drinking water lifelines, was ‘faulty’, Maharashtra Water Resources Minister Girish Mahajan on Thursday said that a case of cheat
Author: Shoumojit Banerjee
